title: runtime.Caller prints incorrect line number
body:
by **seth.bunce**: 
Using revision 6384 with 8g/8l on Debian/Linux.

The attached go program gets incorrect line numbers with runtime.Caller.

The test program should print:
8
9

But it prints:
9
10

The line numbers are off by one.

To use the test program extract it and run "make && ./main"
Attachments: 1. runtime_bug.tar.bz2 (598 bytes)
